types.name: EditorType
types.summary: All possible editor types (besides the default ones for strings & booleans).

types.name: ExcludeAttribute
types.summary: Configuration items marked by this attribute will not be part of the configuration file.

types.name: NameAttribute
types.summary: If a configuration item should be visible in the gui, it needs to be marked by this attribute to get a display name.

types.name: RequiredAttribute
types.summary: Configuration items marked by this attribute become a required item in the propertygrid of the gui.
